amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for renewable energy programs by $30 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in the Congressional Record to increase funding for renewable energy programs by $30 million, to be offset by a decrease of $30 million from the Advanced Simulation and Computing program in the Weapons Activities budget.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sanders amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 150 - 241 (Roll no. 321).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Sanders.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Sanders amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 150 - 241 (Roll no. 321).
